msg: Bugfix for a potential multi-threading issue concerning the use of the java.text package.

author: jeremias
msg: Added fallbacks for Type 1 fonts which don't have the normal "one", "two" etc. glyphs, but actually only provide "oneoldstyle", "twooldstyle" etc. (like "Corpid Light")
